long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pictoria is a powerful browser extension designed to streamline the process of collecting and uploading images to the Pictoria server with just a few clicks. Whether you’re a designer, developer, researcher, or simply someone who loves curating images, Pictoria makes it incredibly easy to gather your visual inspirations and share them seamlessly.
